meanings.sent1: The strong smell of the vomitous food made me feel sick.
meanings.sent2: The medicine had a vomitous taste that made it hard to swallow.
meanings.sent3: The vomitous smell from the garbage can was so awful that even the dog avoided it.
meanings.sent4: The movie was so scary that it left a vomitous feeling in my stomach.
meanings.sent5: The vomitous sight of the spoiled milk made me gag.

meanings.sent1: The vomitous color of the sludge made it look unappetizing.
meanings.sent2: The texture of the mud was so vomitous that I couldn't bear to touch it.
meanings.sent3: The vomitous pattern on the wallpaper made the room look outdated.
meanings.sent4: The vomitous taste of the expired milk was a shock to my taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The vomitous sound of the blender made me cover my ears.
